title: Bella Thorne slips into sexy disco queen costume after partying with Johnny Depp
text:
Halloween is right around the corner, and Bella Thorne is wasting no time getting into the spooky spirit.

She couldn't resist getting into costume, sharing a couple photos of herself as a 70s disco queen while on set of her new movie The Babysitter 2.

The 22-year-old sported the skimpy fringe outfit while posing for the camera with a purple afro.

Disco queen: Bella Thorne got into the Halloween spirit in skimpy fringe disco outfit

Details: She wore a bright purple wig with matching makeup and a bold lip

'70s disco queen on set. I’m always working on Halloween,' she said in the caption of the photo.

The two piece outfit was tan with an all-over fringe look and layered necklaces.

She even added a bit of purple face paint to the look and donned a metallic plum lip as well.

Adorable: '70s disco queen on set. I’m always working on Halloween,' she said in the caption of the photo

Stylish: The two piece outfit was tan with an all-over fringe look and layered necklaces

Her Halloween costume comes after she attended the grand opening of the Guitar Hotel at Seminole Hard Rock Hotel and Casino in Hollywood, Florida.

The Hard Rock's new hotel is the first-ever hotel that is shaped like a guitar and was part of a $1.5 billion expansion project.

The Disney alum seemed like she was having a blast at the hotel where she was joined by some other Hollywood stars including Joe Perry and Johnny Depp.

Famous friends: At the party, she posed for a photo with other party-goers Joe Perry and Johnny Depp

The trio posed with guitars as they attended an exclusive party at the hotel.

Her ex-fling Scott Disick and his girlfriend Sofia Richie also attended the event.

It seems as though the couple avoided the party-goer, keeping to themselves after Bella's brief relationship with Scott when they traveled to Cannes together back in 2017.
